data.name: Shadows of Doubt
data.detailed_description:
A procedurally-generated open world stealth game with a whole city of secrets at your fingertips!




Shadows of Doubt is set in an alternate reality with a noir theme in the hyper-industrialized 1980s, the player works as a private intelligence investigator, making money by solving cases, finding and selling information and other side jobs.

The capture of a rampant serial killer carries a hefty bounty, but who knows what secrets you’ll find along the way: Take on side jobs, spend a night drinking at the bar playing some pool, head out to the streets taking on side jobs, the world is what you make of it!




Explore anywhere in the city! Every nook of every trashy bar, every shady casino, every seedy hotel room. This dystopia is your oyster. Break into apartments, rifle through secret documents or hack security systems, even a receipt on a floor can be tracked to a restaurant, go through their cctv footage matching the time up to the receipt and find out who that receipt belonged to.




The entire world is fully simulated. Each citizen has an apartment, a job, a daily routine, favorite things to do, places to go, and people to interact with. They'll live out their lives independently, and the world moves on with or without you— uncover this knowledge and use it to your advantage!




Shadows of Doubt offers a truly unique detective experience, players will have to think like a detective to solve the cases around them, checking citizens call histories, finding passwords and reading their private emails, speaking to victims acquaintances, watching through cctv and more, all of this information can be stored at your whim on your investigation board, link evidence together using different string colours as you string together the full picture.

Features


  • Multiple ways to access buildings, from knocking on the door to picking locks, climbing through vents, breaking doors down and every door has its own key.
  • Break into security boxes allowing you to open/close security shutters, turn on/off cctv and trip lights to continue your work undetected
  • Purchase detective items such as code-breakers which can be handy when you need to access information quickly
  • Every citizen has a price, whether it be to access a location or gather information, though some are more expensive than others
  • Scan fingerprints or footprints, Check address books and call histories, read private emails, watch CCTV, find old receipts and more, there are plenty of ways to gather information
  • Buy and customize your own apartment as you complete cases and find some extra spare cash
  • Every room in every building is explorable. Lose yourself in an incredibly detailed sci-fi/noir world.

data.short_description: First-person detective stealth game set in a fully-simulated sci-fi noir city. There’s a serial killer on the loose, and it’s up to you to catch them by any means necessary: Sneak, tail, hide, hack and lock-pick. Just keep a low profile!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“This is a work of staggering ambition and no small amount of artistry, presenting an evocative, fully-functioning cityscape for you to explore, complete with several intricate systems underpinning your sleuthing. I've played 20 minutes and I'm simply staggered.”
Eurogamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of graphic violence displayed in a low-fidelity fashion. References and depictions of fictional drug use and alcohol.
